name: Global X Active Preferred Share ETF
longDescription: In order to achieve its investment objective, by investing primarily in preferred shares including securities convertible into preferred shares of Canadian companies. HPR may also invest in preferred shares of companies located in the United States, debt securities, including limited resource capital notes, of Canadian and U.S. issuers, other income generating securities, as well as Canadian equity securities and Listed Funds, as they are defined in the ETFs prospectus. The investment objective of HPR is to provide dividend income while preserving capital.
